[us] raves about their dreams and upcoming successes to [them].
[us] brags about their accomplishments while taking credit for [them]'s efforts.
[us] inspired [them] by facing fears and difficulty head-on.
[us] inspires [them] with a renewed sense of purpose.
[us] entertained [them] with humor.
[us] worries to [them] about their fears.
[us] earns a compliment from [them] for their diligent efforts.
[us] rants excessively to [them] about a series of small details.
[us] seeks advice from [them] about basic life decisions.
[us] forgives [them] for an earlier offense.
[us] elaborates brilliant theories to [them].
[us] can't stop telling [them] about cravings for delicious, unavailable foods.
[us] warmly enjoys the company of [them].
[us] tells [them] a hard, uncomfortable truth.
[us] lets [them] enjoy credit for a shared effort.
[us] squashes the levity and playfulness [them] tries to bring to the situation.
[us] complains to [them] about wasted time and restlessly having to wait.
[us] warmly affirms positive aspects of [them].
[us] motivates effective joint efforts with [them].
[us] uplifts both [them] and [3rd] with a rallying visionary speech.
[us] gets their way through manipulating [them] with deception.
[us] has [them]'s back during a tough time.
[us] banters lewdly with [them].
[us] criticized [them] for off-putting hygiene habits.
[us] complains to [them] about feeling useless.
[us] complained about [them] being too selfish.
[us] complains about never getting what they deserve to [them].
[us] complains to [them] about feeling micromanaged and wanting a break.
[us] complains to [them] about feeling like nobody listens to them.
[us] complains to [them] about feeling like nobody respects them.
[us] complained to [them] about lacking meaning and beauty in life.
[us] expresses insecurities and self-loathing to [them].
[us] unloads to [them] about their anxieties and sense of horror.
[us] whines to [them] about needing space and lacking privacy.
[them] finds [us] erratically muttering, gesturing, and scrawling superstitious symbols and text on any surfaces.
[us] confides in [them] about feeling like something ominous and powerful is out there hunting them.
[us] entertained [them] by singing catchy space shanties and popular anthems.
[us] remembered family, thinking of past conversations and moments with [them].
[us] has a hard but important conversation with [them]. Blood is thicker than water, sometimes.
[us] thought fondly of past conversations and moments with their friend [them].
[us] has a hard but important conversation with [them]. Friendship takes work!
[us] fantasized about being intimate with [them].
[us] found a moment to share intimacy with [them].
[us] fantasized about lost love with [them], before things grew cold.
[us] whined about loneliness and wanting a lover.
[us] had an ugly ex-lover's spat with [them].
[us] reflected on ways to forgive and resolve the conflicts and hostility with their enemy [them].
[us] dreamed of giving their enemy [them] what they deserve.
[us] delighted in daydreaming of their enemy [them] suffering horrific fates.
[us] imagined venting their aggressions on innocent spacers or petware.
[us] found contentment in the little things. The secret of happiness is wanting what you have.
[us] bided the time patiently in comfortable reflection. Good things come to those who wait.
[us] agonized over wasted time. Time and tide wait for no one.
[us] grooved on the moment, without fussing about much of anything. Que sera, sera.
[us] dreamed of re-engineering the ship design.
Cleaned the controls and re-validated software of [them].
[us] cleaned the connections and corrosion on [them].
[us] spent time rewiring [them].
[us] admired the [them]. Isn't it just wonderful?
[us] cleaned the [them] again, just to be safe.
[us] tinkered with the [them].
[us] left the [them] in a mess again.
[us] engages in a self-care beauty routine.
[us] spends considerable time at the [them] primping and enhancing their appearance.
[us] gets lost in self-loathing at the [them] critiquing their appearance.
[us] resists the urge to enjoy a small indulgence.
[us] fails to resist the urge to enjoy a small indulgence, and savors a [them] all to themselves.
